item.title: Individual Page
item.description: This is an individual page. Make a new file in content\page. For example: content\page\mypage.markdown. Add frontmatter, URL can be designated in frontmatter. For example this page has url: "/page1/". Alternatively, create the page anywhere inside content and set the type of it to page in frontmatter type: page. URL of page can be set in the frontmatter with url: "/page1/". If this URL is not set, page is created at baseURL/page/file-name/.
